casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 13, 2010

[Cite as 12/13/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-6051.]

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2010-0442. Lowes Homes Ctrs., Inc. v. Wood Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2006-H-1136. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellant’s application for dismissal,

It is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.
